mapper.insert: insert into add_cash_apply (user_id,alipay_id,alipay_name,money,last_six_order_no,status, create_time) values (#{userId},#{alipayId},#{alipayName},#{money},#{lastSixOrderNo},#{status}, now())
mapper.update: update add_cash_apply set status = 2, finish_time = now() where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select ac.id as applyId, ac.user_id, ac.alipay_name,ac.alipay_id,ac.money, ac.last_six_order_no as order_no,ac.status, ac.create_time,ac.finish_time,u.nickname,u.phone_number from add_cash_apply ac,user u where 1=1 and ac.user_id = u.id order by ac.id desc limit #{start},#{pageSize}
select ifnull(count(1),0) from add_cash_apply ac,user u where 1=1 and ac.user_id = u.id
